CustomField.description: New mapping field created to match the Vertical segment values with Data fridge and Pandora backend for APAC countries.
CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Vertical_Segment__c), "Vehicles", "vehicles", "Mother & Baby", "mother_and_baby", "Bakery", "bakery", "Beauty", "beauty", "Darkstores", "darkstores", "Drinks", "drinks", "Electronics", "electronics", "Furniture", "furniture", "Games", "games", "Groceries", "groceries", "Flowers", "flowers", "Health & Wellness", "health_and_wellness", "Home & Gifts", "home_and_gifts", "Party Supplies", "party_supplies", "Pets", "pets", "Pharmacy", "pharmacies", "Stationery & Books", "stationery_and_books", "Home Based Kitchen", "home_based_kitchen", "Snacks & Sweets", "snacks_and_sweets", "Convenience", "convenience", "Supermarket", "supermarket", "Sports & Lifestyle", "sports_and_lifestyle", "Fashion", "fashion", "Just For Adults", "just_for_adults", "Tobacco", "tobacco", "Regular Restaurant", "restaurants", TEXT(Vertical_Segment__c))
CustomField.label: FP Vertical Segment
